reviews.title: A local pub/hotel.
reviews.text: Pretty good chicken parmesan/cordon bleu, with a good draft beer. The place is obviously popular with the regulars....it is like an English country hotel/inn with a few rooms, but mainly for food and drink. Reasonable prices for the food.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.text: Great service from staff, nothing was too much trouble! Beautiful food, reasonably priced, great atmosphere in the hotel. We are definitely going back :)

reviews.title: Friendly country service
reviews.text: Just had a drink here in the afternoon and the bar staff were very helpful with getting the TV set up for the Olympics.

reviews.title: Pub food
reviews.text: It was good food. Just pub food but well priced but nothing out of the ordinary. Beer was cold and thats all that matters.

reviews.title: Great hambuger
reviews.text: Walking in to hear Johny Cash playing in this outback style pub was a fun experience for us and the kids. Hamburger was really good!

reviews.title: True Aussie Bar!
reviews.text: What we imagined true Aussie Bars would be! A friendly welcome, cold beer and banter with the locals!

reviews.title: Great Pub Counter Meal
reviews.text: Whilst traveling up to Cape Trbulation, we decided to take up the offer as advertised on te side of the road "Great Counter Meals Available" I'm not usually keen on Counter Meals but my Chicken Schnitzel was fabulous and so good to get great attentive service across the bar counter...! When traveling to Cape Trbulation, I can't recommend the counter meals highly enough---you'll love it and the Greg cold beer...!
Loved this place! It has a great atmosphere to it (although I did grow in a rural area and I have always loved places like this)
reviews.title: A lovely traditional pub!
Family meals
reviews.text: I believe the pub was built using trees that had fallen and died naturally in the area. Check out the old photos of the area on the walls too! Very interesting.

reviews.title: Big Burgers
reviews.text: Lunch is only available from 12-2. Get there early, don't arrive at 1.50 and think you will still be able to order. Our meals did take a little while to arrive, however there was only 1 person in the kitchen at the time. But it was worth the wait. It was one of the best meals I had in the Daintree!!

reviews.title: Ok pub food
reviews.text: I must be honest and say that we didn't go there, but all the local employers and employees do go there, and they rave about it. All sorts of people between the Daintree and Cape Tribulation recommended the place! We didn't have enough time, and the delicious motel restaurant food left us with no choice.

reviews.title: not worth it
reviews.text: Place looks dodgy, but food is fab, u will not get your jaws around the burgers.
